<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ProductFieldCheck</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>ProductFieldCheck</name> <script><![CDATA[var ProductFieldCheck = Class.create(); ProductFieldCheck.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
isAnAssetForm: function(current_view, current_target){ var isReferenceList = (current_view == 'sys_ref_list'); var isHardwareForm = (current_target == 'alm_hardware.model'); var isConsumableForm = (current_target == 'alm_consumable.model'); var isFacilityForm = (current_target == 'alm_facility.model'); return isReferenceList && (isHardwareForm || isConsumableForm || isFacilityForm); },
type: 'ProductFieldCheck' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-10-09 00:19:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5a9fb236f5140010fa9b870a4b7c3182</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ProductFieldCheck</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Model Management" source="com.snc.model">680e780f6d2220100acb70b3534330e5</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5a9fb236f5140010fa9b870a4b7c3182</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-10-09 00:19:52</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>553</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
